procurement_category: Goods (category of software, hardware and support services are not included)
short_summary: Purchase of new microwaves for three military dormitories
description: The contracting authority is seeking to replace the old microwaves in three dormitories of the Department of National Defence (DND), located in Garrison (Grn) Petawawa to provide modern and safe appliances to personnel.
tags: goods (,  service tender is not included)
full_summary:
# Microwaves Request for Proposal (RFP)
## Description
Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of new microwaves for the Department of National Defence (DND) at Garrison Petawawa.

## Key Procurement Details
### Solicitation Information
* Solicitation Number: WS3800488009
* Reference Number: WS3800488009-Doc3800543982
* Amendment Number: 0
* Publication Date: December 22, 2022
* Tender Closing Date: January 17, 2023 (14:00:00)
* Expected Contract Start Date: January 20, 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: March 31, 2023

### Procurement Category
* Category: Goods
* Category Description: Other domestic household appliances

### Legal Requirements
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

### Points of Contact
* Contracting Authority: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contact Name: Darlene Keenan
* Contact Email: darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

## Submission Requirements
Offerors are expected to submit their proposals electronically through the Ariba Discovery website, available at: 
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961463?extsite=MTQ5NjE0NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation will be based on the selection criteria outlined in the RFP document. The contract will be awarded to the offeror with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price. 

Note: This RFP has already expired. The above details are being shared for informational purposes only. Do not submit any further offers.
